title: The Community has actually improved
body: I left for a month and i knew the community was so horrible everyone would rage at you if you stuffed up but since i got back everyone and i mean everyone is actually so nice its amazing i dont know what you have done but great work keep it up!

replies.body: is boards everyone seems to be more passive or have rage quit
School is back, that is all that's changed.
It really depends on what time of year/day it is. People tend to be nicer late at night and early in the morning.
